body_html:
Ah, sorry, I should have added "...as featured by conditional SN-GAN". The idea is to have the output stats (weight and bias) but not input (running_var/mean) depend on a class parameter.
Optionally, this could include moving non-cudnn batch norm to ATen.
The original reference is de Vries et. al., Modulating early visual processing by language and there also is an instance norm variant.

body:
Ah, sorry, I should have added "...as featured by conditional [SN-GAN](https://github.com/pfnet-research/sngan_projection)". The idea is to have the output stats (weight and bias) but not input (running_var/mean) depend on a class parameter.
Optionally, this could include moving non-cudnn batch norm to ATen.
The original reference is [de Vries et. al., Modulating early visual processing by language](https://arxiv.org/abs/1707.00683) and there also is an instance norm variant.
